The picture was published on August 27: 2020, on Facebook and has been shared over 300 times.
The post: s caption, translated from Malay to English, indicates that the act of burning the flag was done by a member of the Democratic Action Party (DAP) out of anger towards Muslim leaders of the country.
The photo was previously published by th: CBN on March 6, 2013, with a caption explaining that it shows a former Philippine police officer burning a Malaysian flag during a rally in Manila to protest a military assault by Malaysian forces on Filipino gunmen in Sabah.
